tool_name: Token Scanner Multichain | Honeypot Checker Multichain
tool_description: Token scanner and honeypot checker multichain. Buy/sell tax, suspicious functions, liquidity, ownership etc.
title: Token Scanner Multichain | Honeypot Checker Multichain

api_list.name: Get Chain Id

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description:
Available chains:
**ethereum, bsc, okc, heco, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, avalanche, fantom, kcc, gnosis, tron, linea, harmony, zkysnc, ethw, fon, cronos**

utterances.utterance: What is the chain ID for the ethereum network?
Can you provide the chain ID for bsc?
I need the chain ID of the polygon blockchain.
Tell me the chain ID for the fantom network.
Give me the chain ID for arbitrum.
What is the chain ID for the tron blockchain?
Find the chain ID for the harmony network.
Please provide the chain ID for the zkysnc chain.
I want to know the chain ID for the optimism blockchain.
What chain ID corresponds to the avalanche network?

api_list.name: Scan Token

parameters.name: chain
parameters.description:
Available chains:
**ethereum, bsc, okc, heco, polygon, arbitrum, optimism, avalanche, fantom, kcc, gnosis, tron, linea, harmony, zkysnc, ethw, fon, cronos**

utterances.utterance: Can you scan the token at address 0x1234567890abcdef1234567890abcdef12345678 on the ethereum chain?

Scan the token with address 0x1111111111111111111111111111111111111111 on the polygon network.
